organization.description:
This organization provides metadata about the [Linked Datasets] (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linked_data) that were discovered during a crawl of the Linked Data Web conducted in April 2014. The metadata has been generated automatically from the crawled data. More information about the crawl and the analysis of the crawled data is found [here] (http://linkeddatacatalog.dws.informatik.uni-mannheim.de/state/).

The datasets within this organization together with the datasets of the [LOD Cloud] (http://datahub.io/organization/lodcloud), [Linked Education Cloud] (http://datahub.io/organization/linked-education) and [Open Linguistics Working Group] (http://datahub.io/organization/owlg) organizations form the data basis for the 2014 version of the [Linked Open Data Cloud Diagram](http://data.dws.informatik.uni-mannheim.de/lodcloud/2014/).

If you have any questions concerning this organization, please contact Chris Bizer (chris@bizer.de).
organization.title: LODCloud2014
organization.name: lodcloud2014

name: randomnessguidelondon
notes:
It's a kind of database, kind of review site, used for documenting interesting places in London. Our major obsessions are pubs, restaurants, cafes, bookshops, and museums. We're also quite interested in places that are vegan-friendly and/or accessible.

We collect structured data on everything we include in the guide, so if you want to find a sushi restaurant near a cinema, just use our category search. Or if you want to find a Good Beer Guide pub within 500m of Victoria Station, just look here.

This is not, and never will be, a commercial guide. We don't accept advertising or freebies, and all reviews are written by our team of contributors. Major changes and additions to the site will always be viewable on the News page, and our Statistics page gives an overview of how active the site has been recently.
title: RandomnessGuideLondon
